column5: Hi all,  Got out to Lac Seul with my buddy Al and his kid Kris, we also had their new puppy Chevy along, very, very sweet Lab/Golden Retriever cross. Roloff had to stay home because of this but i'm sure it won't be long before they are introduced and become friends.  Fishing was good and so was Kris's reaction to catching big walleye, he has caught them before but the first fish landed of the day was his biggest by a long way and his reaction to it was special in itself….Lac Seul is a MAGICAL place.  Fish were at 17' - 25' FOW, jigs and minnows vertically jigged. Fish would turn on and off like someone flicked a switch so we moved around a bit but our original spot was the most productive all morning.
Man oh man I look forward to these reports...love lac seul
Awesome as always simon!  Lac seul is so overlooked imo.  Place is unreal and i hardly hear it mentioned.  Thats one heck of a fine fishery!  Ps dont show roloff this report lol
Wonderful report as usual Simon! Thanks for posting! HH

Man oh man I look forward to these reports...love lac seul   Thanks man, t is nice to get feedback, very muchly appreciated!    Awesome as always simon!  Lac seul is so overlooked imo.  Place is unreal and i hardly hear it mentioned.  Thats one heck of a fine fishery!  Ps dont show roloff this report lol  LOL…I know, I have to make it up to Roloff on Sunday with a trip to our shore fishing spot and throw him his 'Kong' toy for an hour or so.    Wonderful report as usual Simon! Thanks for posting! HH  Thanks HH!   What a mammoth walleye factory! It is insane some days, that day was non stop fun….hard to get bored on a day like that.
Thanks for posting Simon.....looks like another great day on the water....

Thanks for posting Simon.....looks like another great day on the water....  My pleasure man!   Great. Any sign of Skis? I have never encountered a muskie in the area I fish, I know they are plentiful around the Sioux Lookout end of the lake (East) but I'm fishing South Central area.
Did I miss a post about a new boat ?  Thats a super duper day dude.  Oh and Im in puppy love.LOL Nice puppy
